title: Large 1-br apartment available September 1
posting_body: ['2-family owner-occupied Victorian in Winter Hill, Somerville', 'Unique older home with character & charm:', 'Hardwood floors, high ceilings, eat-in kitchen.', 'Lots of light.', 'Large closets, including a walk-in closet.', 'Bay window in living room, with dining alcove off to the side.', 'Large, south-facing porch.', 'The apartment is about 710 square foot and the porch deck is 87 square foot.', 'Refrigerator, gas oven and washing machine included.', '(No dryer.)', 'Large bathroom.', 'Access to attic for storage.', 'House is set-back on a quiet street, behind a large front yard, with a garden on the side.', 'Off-street parking for one car.', 'Second car negotiable for additional fee.', 'Additional parking on street.', 'Near Transportation: Broadway Bus Lines: 88, 89, 90, 101', 'No smokers:', 'No smoking in apartment or on property.', 'I’m very allergic and cannot tolerate the smell, which can penetrate the walls.', 'Pets negotiable.', 'Quiet, mature tenant(s), please.', 'No noisy tenants: this is an owner-occupied 2-family: owner/landlord lives underneath this apartment.', '$2500.00/month for single, $2600.00 for couple, plus utilities (gas & electric) and oil-based heat.', 'New, energy-efficient furnace.', 'Security deposit of one month’s rent, and last month’s rent.', 'No Fee.', 'The photos show the empty apartment, and the furnishings of a recent tenant, who is vacating.', 'Not all furniture is currently in the apartment.', 'Lease: September 1 2022-July 31 2023.', 'Note: craigslist defaults to w/d in unit, but apartment has washer only, no dryer']
